page.title: 04PIG FARMING
page.content: There are three pig farms in the area, owned by Mr Emmans, Mr Ventham and Mr Briercliffe. Mr Emmans feeds his pigs on swill, Mr Ventham feeds his pigs on meal and Mr Briercliffe feeds his pigs on bread and beer. Mr Ventham's and Mr Emmans' pigs live in fields and in barns. Mr Briercliffe keeps his pigs in sheds. Mr Emmans has about twenty acres, Mr Ventham ten acres and Mr Briercliffe has about two acres. There are forty one machines in the three pig farms altogether. Mr Emmans rears some of his pigs for babies and some of his pigs for pork. Mr Ventham rears his pigs for pork bacon and babies, Mr Briercliffe rears his pigs for pies and sausages.
